results.adx_keywords: Space and Astronomy;James Webb Space Telescope
results.byline: By Dennis Overbye, Kenneth Chang and Jim Tankersley
results.title: Biden and NASA Share First Webb Space Telescope Image
results.abstract: From the White House on Monday, humanity got its first glimpse of what the observatory in space has been seeing: a cluster of early galaxies.

media.caption: The Webb telescope’s image of the galaxy cluster SMACS 0723 includes thousands of galaxies, including the faintest objects ever observed in infrared. The light from SMACS 0723 in this image is 4.6 billion years old.

results.title: What’s Up With the Crazy Housing Market?
results.abstract: Rising mortgage rates. Faltering home sales. Skyrocketing rents. Here’s how to make sense of a baffling real estate market.
